commit.message:
cfgrtl.c (rtl_tidy_fallthru_edge): Speed up by using EDGE_COUNT.

	* cfgrtl.c (rtl_tidy_fallthru_edge): Speed up by using
	EDGE_COUNT.

files.patch:
